title: iminlovewithanothergirl.com
instrumentation: for snare drum, microphone, & DMX lights
blurb: iminlovewithanothergirl.com is a solo audio/visual piece that focuses on form as prime compositional material.

title: ialreadyforgotyourpussy.com
instrumentation: for amplified wind instrument and amplified snare drum
blurb: ialreadyforgotyourpussy.com is a duet that focuses on memory as prime compositional material.

title: dfscore system
blurb: The dfscore system is a realtime dynamic score system built to function over a local network to display a variety of musical material.

title: pitchy
blurb: pitchy is a piece for the dfscore system in which a solo performer randomly generates, stores, and recalls a harmonic accompaniment.

title: Hands
instrumentation: for winds, guitars, and rhythm section
blurb: Hands is a piece for the dfscore system which is made up of blocks of material that are probabilistically restructured and orchestrated.

title: C-C-Combine
blurb: C-C-Combine is a corpus-based audio mosiacing application built to map arbitrary input to arbitrary output.

title: Grassi Box
blurb: The Grassi Box is a MIDI-to-relay piece of hardware and set of software tools made to control ciat-lonbarde instruments from a computer.

title: Everything. Everything at once. Once. (1)
blurb: Everything. Everything at once. Once. is a series of improvised pieces that focuses on the curation of instruments as the prime compositional material.

title: Everything. Everything at once. Once. (2)
blurb: Everything. Everything at once. Once. is a series of improvised pieces that focuses on the curation of instruments as the prime compositional material.

title: Everything. Everything at once. Once. (3)
blurb: Everything. Everything at once. Once. is a series of improvised pieces that focuses on the curation of instruments as the prime compositional material.

title: Battle Pieces
blurb: The Battle Pieces are a series of pieces that focuses on complex games, improvisational etudes, and competition.

title: The Party Van
blurb: The Party Van is a live performance patch with dozens of modules and effects covering a wide range of processing and synthesis techniques.
comments: add kelly/stuart quotes about chocolate grinder

title: karma~
blurb: karma~ is a looper/sampler external for Max. It is a dynamic length, varispeed looper with some complex features.

title: Making Decisions in Time
blurb: Making Decisions in Time is a conceptual framework and set of analysis tools for thinking about and analyzing improvisation.

title: Cut Glove
blurb: Cut Glove and it’s a live-sampling and processing patch that contains mappings based on video game mechanisms and metaphors.

title: an amplifier, a mirror, an explosion, an intention
blurb: an amplifier is a piece that focuses on time resonances and decision streaming as prime compositional material.

title: the keys to everything that has ever existed
blurb: the keys to everything focuses on the difficulty in engaging in multiple layers of nested games and behaviors.

title: Demo Piece
blurb: Demo Piece is a piece for the dfscore system which focuses on synchronicity/asynchronicity as a compositional parameter in improvised performance.

title: The Chocolate Grinder
blurb: The Chocolate Grinder is a software emulation of a skipping/glitchy CD player.

title: Improvisation
blurb: Created spontaneously or without preparation.

title: Improvisation
blurb: Created spontaneously or without preparation.

title: Time Resonance
blurb: In a non-linear view of time, a resonance is a ‘harmonic’ of a moment in time. It is a re-manifestation of aspects of that ‘time fundamental’.

title: Time Travel
blurb: Experiencing non-linear time through a creative practice.

title: Takahashi’s Shellfish Concern
blurb: Takahashi's Shellfish Concern merges sonic and visual information into a single transmission during improvised performances.

title: Sol Improv Gig (feedback)
blurb: The initial solo improv performance in which I came came across the idea of using a microphone in the manner I do in the .com pieces.

title: The Invention of the History of Visual Art
Improv Etude
blurb: Something that is difficult to do in an improvised manner, generally charging the performance with a perceivable tension.

title: Bach Prelude in F minor #12
instrumentation: for piano and skipping CD player
